Name: Sword of Justice
Description: A holy greatsword found early in the game, imbued with the power of Tyr.

Name: Amulet of Misty Step
Description: Allows the wearer to cast Misty Step once per Short Rest, providing excellent mobility.

Name: Gloves of Dexterity
Description: Sets the wearer's Dexterity to 18, and grants Advantage on Attack Rolls.

Name: Disintegrating Night Walkers
Description: These boots offer Misty Step and immunity to Web, Entangle, and other movement impairing surfaces.

Name: Potent Robe
Description: Increases spell attack rolls and spell save DC, and adds Charisma modifier to Cantrip damage.
Location: Last Light Inn, by Alfira (after quest)

Name: Helm of Balduran
Description: Grants immunity to Stunned and Critical Hits, and restores HP at the start of your turn.
